name: KMA the GMAE
description:
The Kobold Master Alchemist needs you to place towers made out of juices to stop annoying people from ruining your DND game! (Very specific and nobody will understand but IDK what to say)

Tower Defence games are amazing when it comes to strategy. The level of knowledge of different towers and their strengths and weaknesses is great and all but why can't we have full control over our towers. For starters, in real life they don't have infinite ammo. And they also don't have solid, set in stone upgrades either. So meet KMA, a a Tower Defense game where YOU make the towers!
